item.title: There's loads of bit of papaer scattered on the grass verge, 8th December
item.description:
There's a build up of litter on the grass verge, bits of paper and other rubbish. Unfortunately the grass verge along the whole length of Alsike Road needs attention as it's a hot-spot for fly-tipping and littering and needs regular clearing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alsike Road, West Heath, Greater London

item.title: Section of road with now lighting, 8th December
item.description:
This section of road has no lighting. There is a missing centre reservation lamp post that is laying on the Plumstead bound bank. I take a car has crashed into a lamp post and damaged the cable feeding this section of road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastern Way, Greater London

item.title: Sharp huge level drop by hard and softer surface tarmac failing, 8th December
item.description:
Nearby address: 4 B519, London N6 4BT There is a sharp change of surface and a big sinkhole created due to hard and soft tarmac and level sinking. Car bottomed down with big noise and whole car seemed to have got the impact. At night it is very difficult to notice as going downhill and bad street illumination and even though I was going 16mph the car might have damage on the subframe or suspension arm… difficult to tell. I have video of the bang and evidence of speed and result. Tomorrow will have to take the car to the garage to double check if anything is broken or bent.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing bollard cover, 7th December
item.description:
For weeks this badly-sited collapsible bollard has been missing its cover. Given that it is sited on the corner on a school street which has many cyclists every day I am amazed it hasn't been repaired (ideally removed). As someone who recently broke a bone in an accident I would be getting lawyers involved if I became injured.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nairne Grove, Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 16” long by 2” deep pothole at mini roundabout at Elmstead Lane and St Keverne Road., 7th December
item.description:
This pothole has been there for a week or so and formed quickly after the road was reopened following water works on a burst pipe. Extensive damage caused to my nearside tyre this evening which has resulted in an emergency call out and £290 repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broxhold Road SE27 house number 118 side w, 7th December
item.description:
Broxhold Road SE27 house number 118 side wall facing Royal Circus red painted wall and black painted fence both graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Circus, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
